backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining OKLCH color variables and base theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and a layout with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/DishImageModal.t: Modal showing an enlarged dish image with close controls.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying project info, attribution, and dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links and mobile menu sheet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing login state and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for query-related logic since data is mocked.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind theme definitions using updated OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutProject.tsx: Displays project overview, user roles, and implementation details for the food ordering system UI demo.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPortal.tsx: Implements a customer login flow, restaurant browsing, ordering UI, and simulated order status updates.
frontend/src/pages/DeliveryPortal.tsx: Provides delivery partner login and a dashboard to view, pick up, and complete delivery tasks with sample data.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Shows homepage hero content and navigation cards for customer, restaurant, and delivery portals.
frontend/src/pages/RestaurantPortal.tsx: Includes restaurant login and a dashboard to manage sample orders and menu items with accept/reject actions.
frontend/src/pages/Technologies.tsx: Lists frontend, backend, database, and tooling technologies used, with descriptions and categorized UI cards.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the Online Food Ordering System frontend, including requirements, features, images, and architectural notes.
